reviewText: I knew almost everything this dvd had to say. 1 thing I found out that was intriguing that I didn't know was, that Gates McFadden, Dr. Crusher on Star Trek The Next Generation of course, was up for the role of Rebecca Howe. Along with Sharon Stone. I was hoping for current interviews from the cast instead of just archival footage from the time, but, it was still pretty awesome. Cheers is the best!
